properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 7:30PM CST until February 14 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Coldwater River at Sarah.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Coldwater River near Sarah
* from Wednesday February 12 until Friday February 14.
* At 7 PM Monday the stage was...13.3 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 19.5 feet on Thursday February 13.
* Flood stage is 18.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Wednesday February 12 and
continue to rise to near 19.5 feet by Thursday February 13.
* At 20.0 feet...Several homes in Marks are flooded. Farm land
flooding is widepread.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
